SEARCH
Package src.repository

Class MedicineRepository

java.lang.Object
src.repository.MedicineRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMedicineRepository
public class MedicineRepository extends Object implements IMedicineRepository
Repository class for managing medication inventory and stock levels. Implements the IMedicineRepository interface.
